marklogic.body: Coachella is a fusion of all things magical. There is no event like it on Earth. The music, the art, the people, the location-- all of it comes together beautifully in the city of Indio every April for a phenomenon that can only be understood once you experience it for yourself! I have been to Coachella twice, and the organizers do an excellent job of making sure that everyone has their own individual experience. If you ask two people about their experience at Coachella, their answers will not be the same. That is because Coachella is about discovering one's self while discovering art and music. From both of the times I have been to Coachella, I have unraveled a sense of excitement that activates each year as Coachella approaches. I tell people how awesome Coachella is on a regular basis and how much of a great time it is to go. Yet again, Goldenvoice has not disappointed this year, and I would love nothing more than to get the chance to see the Acts they have managed to book. Plus, I miss the people and the atmosphere of Coachella. I went without Coachella last year, and I am Thirsting to go again. I also want to take my sister, who has never been to California, and show her the experience of a lifetime (and show her why I am such a Coachella fanatic)!
